tournament.name: NRG Series $2500 Trial - NRG Series Showdown Weekend

decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to deal as much direct damage to the opponent as quickly as possible through a combination of efficient creatures and burn spells. By applying pressure early on and utilizing spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Spike to finish off the opponent, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent can stabilize. With limited interaction and a low mana curve, this aggressive burn deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent with a relentless assault of damage.

This combo deck focuses on using Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill cards from the opponent's library. With the help of Goblin Engineer and Goblin Welder, the deck can quickly assemble the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's gameplan with Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast. The deck also utilizes aggressive cards like Lightning Bolt and Chaos Defiler to maintain board control. The inclusion of Urza's Saga provides additional utility and potential for explosive plays. The key strategy is to assemble the combo quickly and disrupt opponent's strategies while controlling the board.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board by utilizing a combination of disruptive spells like Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize, as well as efficient removal like Swords to Plowshares. The deck also aims to pressure the opponent with strong creatures like Voice of Victory and Amped Raptor, while also utilizing the synergy between Goblin Bombardment and creatures like Ocelot Pride. Additionally, Ajani, Nacatl Pariah serves as a powerful finisher. The deck also includes a mix of lands to support the mana requirements and disruption elements.

This deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent, along with powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Force of Will, to quickly deal damage to the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Daze and Wasteland. It also utilizes cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Mishra's Bauble for card advantage and tempo advantage. The main goal is to attack fast and disrupt the opponent's strategy before they can establish their own game plan.

Using powerful mana acceleration from Cloudpost lands, this deck aims to quickly ramp up mana to cast massive Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. It also utilizes disruptive elements like Chalice of the Void and Force of Will to control the game and protect its game-winning threats. The deck includes tools like Karn, the Great Creator and Planar Nexus to further support its ramping strategy and overwhelm opponents with high-value plays. With a focus on acceleration and disruption, this deck looks to quickly establish dominance and close out games efficiently.

This deck focuses on quickly locking down the opponent's mana and disrupting their game plan with cards like Magus of the Moon, Chalice of the Void, and Blood Moon. The strategy is to ramp up using cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide to play powerful threats like Broadside Bombardiers and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells like Sundering Eruption while using cards like Urza's Saga to search for key pieces. The deck's mana denial strategy is supported by powerful lands like Ancient Tomb and City of Traitors.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful artifact-based combo using Mystic Forge to cast artifacts from the top of the library. The key cards in the deck allow for explosive mana generation and the ability to manipulate artifacts to create a win condition. The deck aims to control the board through artifacts and disrupt the opponent's strategy while building towards a game-winning combo. The combination of powerful artifacts and mana acceleration allows the player to quickly establish dominance and overwhelm their opponent with a well-timed combo.

The main concept of the deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, and then bring them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. This combo allows for explosive plays and high-powered creatures to be put into play early in the game, overwhelming the opponent. The deck also includes control elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Additionally, the deck includes card draw and filtering tools like Brainstorm and Ponder to help find the necessary pieces for the combo.

Utilizing a combination of powerful artifacts and efficient blue spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By leveraging cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Saga, the deck can generate significant card advantage and board presence. Chalice of the Void and Force of Will help control the opponent's game plan while Thought Monitor and Thoughtcast ensure a steady stream of card draw. With a focus on quick tempo and disruption, this deck looks to secure victories through a mix of early pressure and resource denial.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the combo pieces of Cephalid Illusionist, Nomads en-Kor, and Shuko to mill the library, with Nadu, Winged Wisdom in play to win the game. The deck includes protection and disruption in the form of counter spells like Force of Will and Daze, as well as removal like Swords to Plowshares. The goal is to set up the combo and protect it long enough to win the game through milling or using Thassa's Oracle as an alternate win condition. The inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Urza's Saga provide additional ways to search for combo pieces or disruption.

The deck aims to combo off by using Cephalid Illusionist along with Nomads en-Kor to mill cards from the library, allowing for the graveyard to be filled with creatures like Narcomoeba. This sets up for a win condition with Thassa's Oracle or Dread Return. The deck also includes control elements like counterspells and removal spells to protect the combo. Urza's Saga provides additional utility by tutoring for key pieces, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student can dig for combo pieces. Overall, the deck focuses on assembling the combo quickly and efficiently to win the game.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the Cephalid Breakfast combo using Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to mill your library, put Narcomoeba into play, and then use Dread Return to bring back Thassa's Oracle for the win. The deck includes various ways to protect the combo with cards like Force of Will and Daze, along with card draw and manipulation spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to help find the necessary combo pieces. The inclusion of Urza's Saga provides additional tutoring for key combo pieces.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive Eldrazi creatures and disrupting opponents with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer. It aims to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure while using lands like Ancient Tomb and Eye of Ugin to cast powerful Eldrazi spells effectively. The inclusion of Wasteland helps to disrupt opponents' mana bases, allowing the deck to gain an advantage and close out games quickly.

This deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah, and Orcish Bowmasters to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also includes disruption cards like Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck can also generate additional value by sacrificing creatures to Goblin Bombardment. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy, with cards like Wasteland for disruption and dual lands for consistency. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and control the game through a combination of aggression and disruption.

The main concept of this Combo - Painter deck is to quickly assemble the Painter's Servant + Grindstone combo to mill the opponent's library and win the game. The deck includes various cards to support this combo, such as Goblin Engineer and Goblin Welder to search for artifacts, as well as disruption spells like Pyroblast and Lightning Bolt to control the opponent's board. The deck aims to efficiently create a lock down situation with Ensnaring Bridge while utilizing mana acceleration from cards like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide to execute the combo effectively.

Utilizing a powerful combination of graveyard interaction and efficient creatures, this deck aims to quickly fill the graveyard with key creatures and then reanimate them for a game-winning advantage. By utilizing cards like Entomb and Reanimate alongside disruption like Thoughtseize and Force of Will, the deck can quickly assemble its combo pieces while disrupting the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of versatile creatures like Brazen Borrower and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide additional value and flexibility to adapt to different game situations. Overall, the deck focuses on explosiveness and efficiency to overwhelm the opponent.
